response.final_text:
I don’t have a tool named "nonexistent_tool." If you tell me what you want that tool to do, I can either do it myself or use one of the available tools:

- Get the current time (functions.get_current_time)
- Evaluate a math expression (functions.calculator)
- Request human approval for a sensitive action (functions.request_approval)
- Run multiple of the above in parallel (multi_tool_use.parallel)

What do you want to accomplish? If you want, name the action and I’ll pick the appropriate tool or perform it directly.
